languages.text: "Соломон прав, зачем выбирать кого-то одного? Приказываю кандидатам трудиться сообща".
"Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."
languages.original_text: "Соломон прав, зачем выбирать кого-то одного? Приказываю кандидатам трудиться сообща".

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."
"Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."
"Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."
"Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

languages.text: "Solomorne hat recht. Wozu einen auswählen? Ich ordne hiermit an, dass die Kandidaten ihre Bemühungen bündeln."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne hat recht. Wozu einen auswählen? Ich ordne hiermit an, dass die Kandidaten ihre Bemühungen bündeln."

languages.text: "Solomorne haklı. Neden birini seçeyim ki? Adayların çabalarını birleştirmelerini emrediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: "Solomorne haklı. Neden birini seçeyim ki? Adayların çabalarını birleştirmelerini emrediyorum."

languages.text: «Solomorne tiene razón. ¿Por qué elegir solo a uno? Ordeno que todos los candidatos aúnen sus esfuerzos».
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: «Solomorne tiene razón. ¿Por qué elegir solo a uno? Ordeno que todos los candidatos aúnen sus esfuerzos».

languages.text: “索罗蒙说得没错，为什么一定要选择其中一个？我命令三位候选人共同担任这个职位。”
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: “索罗蒙说得没错，为什么一定要选择其中一个？我命令三位候选人共同担任这个职位。”

languages.text: « Solomorne a raison. Pourquoi n'en choisir qu'un ? J'ordonne aux candidats d'unir leurs efforts dès à présent. »
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: « Solomorne a raison. Pourquoi n'en choisir qu'un ? J'ordonne aux candidats d'unir leurs efforts dès à présent. »

languages.text: 「ソロモーンの言うとおりだ。なんで一人に絞る？候補ども、協力しろ」
languages.original_text: "Solomorne is right. Why choose one? I hereby order the candidates to pool their efforts."

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモルネの言うとおりだ。なんで一人に絞る？候補ども、協力しろ。」
